message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $110 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we say $108?
